data.title: What Characters You Believe Should Have More Techniques?
data.meta_description:
Read Title and explain what they might be? 


Just a question that been on my mind.
data.text:
I got to start of with Asuma who litteraly and logically does have techniques that weren't fully shown. The amount of stuff Asuma should be able to do is appalling how limited they did him.

1. Buzzsaw Chakra Sword- Which could solve for a single or more style of purpose. This could have better his cqc skills as well.

2. Fire Release: Fire Dragon Flame Bullet- As Asuma was the son of Hiruzen and top Jonin and Konohamaru picked it up. Asuma should have picked up this technique. But his character really mainly spams Ash cloud.

3. Fire Release: Great Flame Technique- This is a technique Asuma would have as he is a member of the Sarutobi clan. You can't pull that could have been made after Asuma because that's really pushing it

4. Double bladed wind chakra- Their was no reason when Asuma had 2 chakra blades that he couldn't serve to use both at the same time ever.

5. Fire Release: Flint Yagura- This is shown by Asuma doing the PS2 Japanese Ultimate ninja 5. However if we say Mirai Sarutobi Shinden story is canon. She litteraly uses this with a lighter that of Asuma who displayed the technique in a game. That's mind blown imo

6. Wind Release: Whirlwind fist- This is shown again by Asuma doing the PS2 Japanese Ultimate ninja 5. However again shown in Mirai Sarutobi Shinden story. Albeit with Mirai she got support to do the jutsu to aid the technique with Temari. However Asuma should be able to replicate a form

Now @Aegon Targaryen cause I want you to read this part. To show Asuma was done dirty lol. In Mirai Sarutobi book chapter 12. Shikamaru litteraly says he will teach every jutsu Asuma used. No reason he could go further. So even by design Asuma should be able to do every single one.

8. Mirai can channel both blades at the same time. So why didn't Asuma do it. Asuma should be able to and I say he can but seemed unnecessary in his battle moments or had to drop his blade after injury and didn't get them as Edo.

9. Mirai Sarutobi Flying Swallow Version- Her version is instead of concentrating chakra she gathers a large amount of chakra around the blade and blasts her extension. Just to create a large slicing wind Hien that blasts high in to the air or rather mid range into the air.

10. Should also utilize these large wind chakra extension as well similar to Mirai.

11. More non bladed wind style- His wind style technique seemed very advanced to only have one imo
